channel.title: Sincerity | Bounty Hunter | Bounties | OSRS Bosses | OSRS Items | Titles | EP
channel.description:
[COLOR="#FFFFFF"][CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/fIMEy6X.gif[/img]
Developer(s)- [img]http://toolkit.sfu.ca/webct/browser/java/images/java_icon.gif[/img][URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/hiken/"]Hiken[/URL] [img]http://toolkit.sfu.ca/webct/browser/java/images/java_icon.gif[/img][URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/twisty/"]Twisty (Myself)[/URL] [img]http://toolkit.sfu.ca/webct/browser/java/images/java_icon.gif[/img][URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/morphine/"]Morphine[/URL]
[URL=http://http://sincerity317.org/Sincerity.jar]Download Client[/URL]
The start of something huge is beginning to take its turn. We're edging more towards the state of PvP with slight skills and PvM incorporated to make the server benefit in various different ways. We'll be working on many different aspects of the server to perfect the game play, and give the community what they want. Enforcing PvP, with newer features, and custom work will ensure a enjoyable game play throughout our server. Many servers come and go, we'll be sticking around to revolutionize the PvP aspect of any private server. We're built to inspire, many will come, many will go. In the long run, the majority that stays will not regret it.
Sincerity - the quality of being free from pretense, deceit, or hypocrisy. Synonyms: honesty, genuineness, truthfulness, integrity, probity, trustworthiness;
What is an EloRating? Our Elo Rating system is a custom system, that classifies each player by ranking. The higher your rating, by earning kills, the better your skull gets. If you're a good pker, and dominating the wildy, your Elo Rating goes up, causing your skull to change colors.
What's the aspect on our Elo Rating System? If you're a pker with a high Elo Rating, for example, if you're Elo Rating is 1500, and your opponents Elo Rating is 1000, and they kill you, they're Elo Rating will raise a lot more as they're killing someone of a higher ranking. And the user who died with the higher ranking, their Elo will drop a fair amount, and it's the same way around.
What's our Activity Point System? For every 40 minutes of in-game time you reach, you get an Activity Point, each point can be stacked and gained to save up for special items. You wont' even realize you're gaining points when you're out Pk'ing!
[URL=http://www.sincerity317.org/]Website[/URL] [URL=http://www.sincerity317.org/Forum/]Forums[/URL]
Server Features- -Bounty Targets -Elo Rating System -Killstreak System -KDR System -Custom Loyalty Titles -Artifact System -OSRS Bosses (Scorpia, Venenatis, Callisto) -OSRS Items (Staff of Dead, Tentacle Whip, Armadyl Crossbow, Bounty Rings) -Falador PvP (Multi) -Ice Platue -Activity Reward Points -And Much More!!
[SPOILER=Media] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/db8640ed71bc7fed1a7c0465f9e8be14.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/f4790783ca2eed42158f0458be08eed6.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/8c83a57a593b83ff5d6341a9b658cba1.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/04dd0b2d5af55695da8dcec8baea22dd.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/8Nv2rzt.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/8r3v9MX.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZG46Jad.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/pad5t3G.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/HdnpQQ1.png[/img] [img]http://prntscr.com/5wo32w[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/OOIWXsP.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/DbRZDYt.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/TeLDgRU.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/zMTtmSH.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/gKlOPHX.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/AY5O8Nn.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/prsQmQg.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=What's been done]-Added Command for players to master their stats. ::master -Added Command for players to become a Zerk pure by doing ::zerkpure -Fixed the decanting of potions, didnt register the click for decanting. -created ep class -created earning potential variables -started on the rewards enumeration for ep -added more rewards to the rewards enumeration -started and completed the increase ep method -started and completed the reduceep method -initialized the increase ep method when in the wilderness -fixed a bug of the cycle event of increasing ep running multiple times -started on method for giving a basic drop for earning potential -created elo rating system variables -implemented elorating system -started on method for having a chance to get rare drop from earning potential (the higher your ep the more better your drop can be) -finished give basic drop method -finished give rare drop method -started method to reduce ep when teleporting during combat -finished method to reduce ep when teleporting -initialized the give drop methods in apply dead method -initialized the reduce ep method if player is in wilderness in startteleport method -found some bh head icons -packed the head icons into cache -implemented head icons into client -implemented head icons into server -Made bh head icon based on your elo rating -Started Bh class -Created Bounty hunter variables for bh -Added Bh interfaces into Client -Implemented Bh interfaces server sided -Done assign target method, and reset target method -Done handle log in and handle log out methods -Done initalize method -Added check to initalize method so cycle events do not run multiple times -Modified Bh interfaces to my liking -gambling chest -Fixed item slots for osrs shields -Added osrs items into item.cfg -Added overloads Client sided -Added overloads server sided -Added overloads quicker restore after drinking brew so more benefit towards donators -Found ints for osrs bosses -Found models for osrs bosses such as callisto, vetion vennatis, scorpia, etc -Started work on new client -Matched head icons sent to server -Made New client compatible with source -Added RSA to client -Fixed t1 and t2 errors with new client -Added all interfaces from old client -Added oldschool items to new client -Added oldschool bosses to new client -Added oldschool bosses into npc.cfg -Gathered Animations for callisto -Done callisto 3 attack styles: Melee, Mage, Special -Made special attack occur once every 10-15 hits -Made it so if player is within a certain radius of callisto they will get hit for 70 -Fixed Some Animations for weapons -Created venenatis boss variables -Initalized venenatis variables -Done reset method for when venenatis dies -Gathered all animations for venenatis -Gathered all gfx for venenatis -Started on venenatis attack styles: Melee, Mage, Special -Done special attack, so all players is with certain radius they will get hit for certain amount and get frozen in place and venenatis will also drain your prayer points -Created scorpia variables -Initalized scorpia variables -Done reset upon death method for scorpia -Added attack and death emote for scorpia -Done attack styles for scorpia: Melee, Special -Done special attack for scorpia, scorpia will hit a certain amount and regenerate hit points -Made scorpia apply a strong poison on the player -Fixed multi icon fix (Came up as a protect from range instead of 2 swords) -uploaded cache to website -added cache downloader to client -made cache load from external file location (not inside client) -fixed a bunch of errors -added callisto drops -fixed coins stack colours -Added callisto drops -Added scorpia drops -Added venenatis drops -Added venenatis, callisto, scorpia to correct locations -Added teleports to the 3 os bosses -Player following clipping -Npc following clipped -Npc walking clipped -Added PvP Projectile Clipping -Added newer combat style interfaces for combat tab so it doesnt look old -Also updated the special attack bar -Made Overloads Donators Only -Fixed oldschool wilderness shield colours -Added hotkeys (using fkeys to switch tabs) -Did some bug fixes on oldschool bosses -added Anchor animations and special attack -Changed special bar -Added rewards to crystal chest -Added Home teleport -Renamed all teleports in spell book so you can actually see where you are teleporting -Fixed a big bug to do with attack people anywhere -Added blessed saradomin sword -Added saradomin sword special to blessed saradomin sword -Added blessed saradomin sword into item.cfg -Added animations for blessed saradomin sword -Made blessed saradomin sword special attack better than saradomin swords -Added more rewards into gamble chest -Made seer a teleport npc -Renamed portals so you know which one your clicking -Added Loyalty titles -Added Loyalty titles into chat box when speaking -Added new Text Engine to the Client, this will allow for better looking text colours -Fixed <col> issues on chatbox -Fixed <col> issued on friends tab -Also added colour to make loyalty titles look better -Went through all of server and done @red@ @dre@ @blu@ etc fixes -Wrote out KillStreak System for server -Initialized KillStreak System -Added KillStreak rewards[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Support us - Our Designs] [img]http://i.imgur.com/27IugnC.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/9HSukor.gif[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/JDtzanb.gif[/img][/SPOILER][/CENTER][/COLOR]

item.title: Sincerity | Bounty Hunter | Bounties | OSRS Bosses | OSRS Items | Titles | EP
item.dc:creator: @hiken hiken
item.description:
@hiken wrote:

[COLOR="#FFFFFF"][CENTER]

Developer(s)-
[URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/members/hiken/”]Hiken[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/members/twisty/”]Twisty (Myself)[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/members/morphine/”]Morphine[/URL]

[URL=http://http://sincerity317.org/Sincerity.jar]Download Client[/URL]

The start of something huge is beginning to take its turn. We’re edging more towards the state of PvP with slight skills and PvM incorporated to make the server benefit in various different ways. We’ll be working on many different aspects of the server to perfect the game play, and give the community what they want. Enforcing PvP, with newer features, and custom work will ensure a enjoyable game play throughout our server. Many servers come and go, we’ll be sticking around to revolutionize the PvP aspect of any private server. We’re built to inspire, many will come, many will go. In the long run, the majority that stays will not regret it.

Sincerity - the quality of being free from pretense, deceit, or hypocrisy.
Synonyms: honesty, genuineness, truthfulness, integrity, probity, trustworthiness;

What is an EloRating? Our Elo Rating system is a custom system, that classifies each player by ranking. The higher your rating, by earning kills, the better your skull gets. If you’re a good pker, and dominating the wildy, your Elo Rating goes up, causing your skull to change colors.

What’s the aspect on our Elo Rating System? If you’re a pker with a high Elo Rating, for example, if you’re Elo Rating is 1500, and your opponents Elo Rating is 1000, and they kill you, they’re Elo Rating will raise a lot more as they’re killing someone of a higher ranking. And the user who died with the higher ranking, their Elo will drop a fair amount, and it’s the same way around.

What’s our Activity Point System? For every 40 minutes of in-game time you reach, you get an Activity Point, each point can be stacked and gained to save up for special items. You wont’ even realize you’re gaining points when you’re out Pk’ing!

[URL=http://www.sincerity317.org/]Website[/URL]
[URL=http://www.sincerity317.org/Forum/]Forums[/URL]

Server Features-
-Bounty Targets
-Elo Rating System
-Killstreak System
-KDR System
-Custom Loyalty Titles
-Artifact System
-OSRS Bosses (Scorpia, Venenatis, Callisto)
-OSRS Items (Staff of Dead, Tentacle Whip, Armadyl Crossbow, Bounty Rings)
-Falador PvP (Multi)
-Ice Platue
-Activity Reward Points
-And Much More!!

[SPOILER=Media]

















[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=What’s been done]-Added Command for players to master their stats. ::master
-Added Command for players to become a Zerk pure by doing ::zerkpure
-Fixed the decanting of potions, didnt register the click for decanting.
-created ep class
-created earning potential variables
-started on the rewards enumeration for ep
-added more rewards to the rewards enumeration
-started and completed the increase ep method
-started and completed the reduceep method
-initialized the increase ep method when in the wilderness
-fixed a bug of the cycle event of increasing ep running multiple times
-started on method for giving a basic drop for earning potential
-created elo rating system variables
-implemented elorating system
-started on method for having a chance to get rare drop from earning potential (the higher your ep the more better your drop can be)
-finished give basic drop method
-finished give rare drop method
-started method to reduce ep when teleporting during combat
-finished method to reduce ep when teleporting
-initialized the give drop methods in apply dead method
-initialized the reduce ep method if player is in wilderness in startteleport method
-found some bh head icons
-packed the head icons into cache
-implemented head icons into client
-implemented head icons into server
-Made bh head icon based on your elo rating
-Started Bh class
-Created Bounty hunter variables for bh
-Added Bh interfaces into Client
-Implemented Bh interfaces server sided
-Done assign target method, and reset target method
-Done handle log in and handle log out methods
-Done initalize method
-Added check to initalize method so cycle events do not run multiple times
-Modified Bh interfaces to my liking
-gambling chest
-Fixed item slots for osrs shields
-Added osrs items into item.cfg
-Added overloads Client sided
-Added overloads server sided
-Added overloads quicker restore after drinking brew so more benefit towards donators
-Found ints for osrs bosses
-Found models for osrs bosses such as callisto, vetion vennatis, scorpia, etc
-Started work on new client
-Matched head icons sent to server
-Made New client compatible with source
-Added RSA to client
-Fixed t1 and t2 errors with new client
-Added all interfaces from old client
-Added oldschool items to new client
-Added oldschool bosses to new client
-Added oldschool bosses into npc.cfg
-Gathered Animations for callisto
-Done callisto 3 attack styles: Melee, Mage, Special
-Made special attack occur once every 10-15 hits
-Made it so if player is within a certain radius of callisto they will get hit for 70
-Fixed Some Animations for weapons
-Created venenatis boss variables
-Initalized venenatis variables
-Done reset method for when venenatis dies
-Gathered all animations for venenatis
-Gathered all gfx for venenatis
-Started on venenatis attack styles: Melee, Mage, Special
-Done special attack, so all players is with certain radius they will get hit for certain amount and get frozen in place and venenatis will also drain your prayer points
-Created scorpia variables
-Initalized scorpia variables
-Done reset upon death method for scorpia
-Added attack and death emote for scorpia
-Done attack styles for scorpia: Melee, Special
-Done special attack for scorpia, scorpia will hit a certain amount and regenerate hit points
-Made scorpia apply a strong poison on the player
-Fixed multi icon fix (Came up as a protect from range instead of 2 swords)
-uploaded cache to website
-added cache downloader to client
-made cache load from external file location (not inside client)
-fixed a bunch of errors
-added callisto drops
-fixed coins stack colours
-Added callisto drops
-Added scorpia drops
-Added venenatis drops
-Added venenatis, callisto, scorpia to correct locations
-Added teleports to the 3 os bosses
-Player following clipping
-Npc following clipped
-Npc walking clipped
-Added PvP Projectile Clipping
-Added newer combat style interfaces for combat tab so it doesnt look old
-Also updated the special attack bar
-Made Overloads Donators Only
-Fixed oldschool wilderness shield colours
-Added hotkeys (using fkeys to switch tabs)
-Did some bug fixes on oldschool bosses
-added Anchor animations and special attack
-Changed special bar
-Added rewards to crystal chest
-Added Home teleport
-Renamed all teleports in spell book so you can actually see where you are teleporting
-Fixed a big bug to do with attack people anywhere
-Added blessed saradomin sword
-Added saradomin sword special to blessed saradomin sword
-Added blessed saradomin sword into item.cfg
-Added animations for blessed saradomin sword
-Made blessed saradomin sword special attack better than saradomin swords
-Added more rewards into gamble chest
-Made seer a teleport npc
-Renamed portals so you know which one your clicking
-Added Loyalty titles
-Added Loyalty titles into chat box when speaking
-Added new Text Engine to the Client, this will allow for better looking text colours
-Fixed issues on chatbox
-Fixed issued on friends tab
-Also added colour to make loyalty titles look better
-Went through all of server and done @red@ @dre@ @blu@ etc fixes
-Wrote out KillStreak System for server
-Initialized KillStreak System
-Added KillStreak rewards[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Support us - Our Designs]

[/SPOILER][/CENTER][/COLOR]
